msg.msgText: The log auto transfer test failed.

msgExplanation.p:
The parameters that are specified for automatic log transfer test cannot be validated. The validation can fail for the following reasons:
The destination value is incorrect.
The destination is not available.
The user ID or password are incorrect.
The permissions of the directory on the remote host are incorrect.

ul.li: Use the net-test command to verify that the remote host can be accessed.
Ensure that the user ID and password are correct.
Verify that the correct permissions are set for the directory that the files are uploaded to.
